Package me.masstrix.lang.langEngine

Class LanguageEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.masstrix.lang.langEngine.LanguageEngine
  • public class LanguageEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles language files for multi language support in applications.

    • Constructor Summary

      LanguageEngine​(java.io.File folder)
      Defines a new language engine.

      Defines a new language engine.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LanguageEngine

        public LanguageEngine​(java.io.File folder)
        Defines a new language engine.
        Parameters:
        folder - folder to load .lang files from.

      • LanguageEngine

        public LanguageEngine​(java.io.File folder,
                      java.lang.String fallback)
        Defines a new language engine.
        Parameters:
        folder - folder to load .lang files from.
        fallback - nullable. sets the fallback language. If null no fallback will be used and return the keys when a text is not found from the selected language. If the fallback is set and is is loaded, any missing text will attempt to be retrieved from the fallback language.

    • Method Detail

      • setLogger

        public LanguageEngine setLogger​(java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        Sets the logger used by the language engine to print any info.
        Parameters:
        logger - logger to use.
        Returns:
        an instance of this engine.

      • loadFrom

        public void loadFrom​(java.io.File folder)
        Sets the file to load language files from.
        Parameters:
        folder - folder to load .lang files from.

      • setPersistent

        public LanguageEngine setPersistent​(java.lang.String... languages)
        Sets what languages should always be loaded in memory. Once run it will set all defined languages to be persistent. This means when the text values are loaded for that language they will not be removed when the language is changed.
        Parameters:
        languages - language to keep persistent.
        Returns:
        instance of this engine.

      • copyLanguagesFrom

        public void copyLanguagesFrom​(java.io.File folder)
        Copies all .lang files from a folder to the working folder for this language engine instane.
        Parameters:
        folder - folder to copy .lang files from.

      • loadLanguages

        public int loadLanguages()
        Reads all .lang files in the language folder. If a language has already been loaded then it will update the values of that language.
        Returns:
        number of languages loaded.

      • loadSingle

        public void loadSingle​(java.io.File file)
        Loads a single .lang file.
        Parameters:
        file - file to load, the file must have a .lang extension to be read.

      • list

        public java.util.Collection<Lang> list()
        Lists all loaded languages in a collection.
        Returns:
        all loaded languages.

      • getSelected

        public java.lang.String getSelected()
        Returns:
        the selected language.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive​(Lang lang)
        Returns if the selected language is the same.
        Parameters:
        lang - language to check.
        Returns:
        if this language is the selected one.

      • setLanguage

        public void setLanguage​(Lang lang)
        Sets the language to use.
        Parameters:
        lang - language to change to.

      • setLanguage

        public void setLanguage​(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the language to use.
        Parameters:
        name - name of locale.

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText​(java.lang.String key)
        Returns a text value from the selected language. If the language was not loaded and a fallback was set it will attempt to get the text value from the fallback language. If there is no fallback set and the key does not exists in the selected language or the fallback if enabled the key will be returned.
        Parameters:
        key - key of the text.
        Returns:
        the text if it exists otherwise a error will be returned.
